Project.title-2: with the comfort of a family house

ProjectDescPoint.projectPo4: At least one terrace for each apartment
ProjectDescPoint.projectPo5: Playground at the entrance to the complex

Intro.description: After Petržalka and Ružinov, we are bringing Novanta branded living to Prievoz as well. It was created by our experienced development company, which has completed several successful and award-winning projects in Bratislava.

Locality.description:
Novanta will be located on Strojnícka Street, in the green part of Prievoz.
It represents an exceptional symbiosis of nature, urban comfort,
privacy in a gated area, excellent transport connections to the bypass
and integrated transport, with complete civic amenities within walking distance.

References.description1: Novanta has been active in the real estate market since 2013, with a long history in construction. We are a stable team of experienced developers complemented by qualified professionals.
References.description2: We have completed several successful residential projects, received architectural awards, and maintain a transparent approach. We focus on comprehensive development and creating modern urban environments.

Hero.title:
Novanta Prievoz
— modern housing
Hero.description: Premium location, timeless architecture, comfort without compromise

ChooseFlat.description: Are you looking for housing in an accessible location, a safe home in a private gated community, with a garden or terrace for sitting with friends or relaxing with a coffee and a good book?

Table.description: The listed measurements are provisional and may not match the implementation project. The apartment area includes the internal partition walls, excluding the garden, terrace, or loggia.

Timeline.heading: Construction Timeline
Timeline.description: Follow the current progress of the project – from building permit to final approval and handover of the apartments.
